what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: works. plugin {leaflet} add “super” features. original idea create addSupClust() function adding supercluster layer integrating supercluster Apache Arrow JavaScript module & {htmlwidgets} package. Also interested creating addGeoJSONvt() function adding geojson-vt layer GeoJSON Vector Tiles. Demos experiments. push limits browser & require continue waiting responsiveness. soon …

title: Add a supercluster layer — addSupClust
text: map map widget object created leaflet::leaflet() path relative path / absolute URL Arrow IPC stream file

title: Add a supercluster layer — addSupClust
code: if (FALSE) { map <- leaflet() %>%   addProviderTiles(provider = providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter) %>%   addSupClust(     path = "data/big.arrow", ~lon, ~lat, layerId = ~ID, radius = 4, stroke = FALSE,     fillOpacity = 0.8, label = ~paste("ID: ", ID, sep = ""),     popupOptions = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE),     clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions()   ) %>%   setView(lng = 0, lat = 0, zoom = 2) }
